Detailed Description

Describes the view of a time editbox.

Member Function Documentation

void TimeEditBoxView::Draw (  const Component &  component,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [virtual]
 

Abstract method which must be implemented by derived classes.

Parameters:
component Component, which contains the data needed for drawing.
dc Pointer to the device context for drawing.
repaint_rect Bounding rectangle which describes the area, which must be repainted. For less complex drawing operations, this parameter can be ignored.

Implements View.

void TimeEditBoxView::DrawTimeEditBox (  const TimeEditBoxModel &  model,
DeviceContext *  dc,
const Rect &  repaint_rect
)  const [protected, virtual]
 

Draws the data of a timeeditbox described by the model. Must be implemented in the corresponding theme view.

Parameters:
model Model describing the data of a timeeditbox.
dc Pointer to the device context, where the drawing should be done.
repaint_rect Rectangle which indicates, where the repainting must be done.
